compulsive.translation[0].definitions[0]: compulsive behaviour is very difficult to stop or control, and is often a result of or a sign of a mental problem
Compulsive overspending in these days of credit cards has become more common.
compulsive.translation[0].definitions[1]: a book, programme etc that is compulsive is so interesting that you cannot stop reading or watching it
‘Gardening World’ is compulsive viewing for gardeners.
